titleStmt.title: The vnitie and scisme of the olde chirche
Unitie and scisme of the olde chirche.
titleStmt.author: Joye, George, d. 1553.

notesStmt.note: Colophon: Thus endeth this lytle boke gathered by George Joy.
Place of publication and printer from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
